character.statement: There's no way I can cross that chasm!
Yeah, whatever. I'm still mad at your brother for getting me voted off from that show.
Will no one rid me of these meddlesome narfs?
Gee whiz, thanks! Those pets almost drove *me* over the edge!

exchange.question: Why can't I cross?
exchange.answer: Much too dangerous. You could fall and die! Or even skin a knee!

exchange.question: But it looks so fun over there!
exchange.answer: It's very fun! You'd probably have the time of your life. But you can't go.

exchange.question: But please...!
exchange.answer: I said... YOU SHALL NOT PASS!

character.statement: I said... YOU SHALL NOT PASS!
Huh. Well, I guess you can cross. Those fuzzy pets look pretty safe.
